item.title: Badger
item.description: SKILL LEVEL: ⭐⭐ SIZE: 8.5” / 21.5 cm tall when made with the indicated yarn. badger pattern MATERIALS: Worsted weight yarn in white, light gray and dark gray Size C-2 / 3 mm crochet hook Safety eyes (15 mm) Triangular safety nose (22mm x 16mm) Yarn needle Stitch markers Fiberfill for stuffing foot (make 2, start in dark gray yarn) We start by making two feet.
